entry.title: JET JBT-1330 - Turbo Butane Torch 380022
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Torches
Price: 71.22

[shortdesc]

Turbo Butane Torch

  • Industrial quality hand held torches for a variety of applications
  • Meets Consumer Products Safety Commission child safety standards
  • Every torch factory tested for performance and safety
  • Specially designed to prevent liquid gas from entering nozzle, preventing flame outs and allowing use in any orientation
  • Piezo ignition requires no batteries or flints
  • Larger turbo flame for heating wider areas such as frozen pipes
  • Gas adjustment valve controls flame volume
  • Anodized aluminum barrel is tough and corrosion resistant
  • Can be locked in on position for production work
  • Includes stand for hands-free use
  • Uses standard butane lighter fuel (not included)
  • Perfect for:
  • electrical and mechanical repair
  • jewelry making and repair
  • paint removal
  • soldering
  • brazing
  • bending plastics
  • thawing pipes
  • starting campfires
  • culinary use
  • A must-have for any tool box
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand JET
    Product Type Torches

    Extra Product Information

  • 1,300Â°C Flame

    • Product Information

  • Fuel Capacity : 30 ml
  • Burn Time in Minutes (High/Low) : 60/90 min
  • Type: Turbo flame

[shortdesc]
  • Mini Butane Torch Industrial quality hand held torches for a variety of applications
  • Meets Consumer Products Safety Commission child safety standards
  • Every torch factory tested for performance and safety
  • Specially designed to prevent liquid gas from entering nozzle, preventing flame outs and allowing use in any orientation
  • Piezo ignition requires no batteries or flints
  • Micro flame heats a very small, precise area
  • Air adjustment ring and gas adjustment valve allow precise adjustment of flame
  • Anodized aluminum barrel is tough and corrosion resistant
  • Can be locked in on position for production work
